item.title: Do Eye Floaters Trigger Health Anxiety?
item.description:
It starts with a shadow. A thread. A flicker in your vision.
You blink. It moves.
And just like that, you’re down the rabbit hole:

“Is this something serious?”
“Is it retinal detachment?”
“What if I go blind?”
“Why won’t it go away?”
“What if no one believes me?”

You’re not just seeing a floater — you’re fighting a fear storm.

If you’re wondering “Do eye floaters trigger health anxiety?”
The answer is yes. And here’s why.
